abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32845618, pmid32845317, pmid32829467, pmid32808712, pmid32841519, pmid32399563, pmid32841354, pmid32841362, pmid32845385, pmid32484159, pmid32840582, pmid32833283, pmid32833259
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.08.31
